name: They Don't Spare
description:
Dev Log: Build uploaded at 00:05 because basic build wouldn't work on itch.io.

BE AWARE, THIS SUBMISSION INCLUDES SOME JUMPSCARES

An arcade claw machine in an unsettling setting.

Controls

W/A/S/D to control the claw machine.
Space to drop the claw.

Credits

Coding and animations by me. Everything else is provided by incredible people that post resources online for free use.

Sound effects from Zapsplat.com.
Some icons from Kenney's.
The monster models are submitted here by Elbolilloduro.
The "Claw Machine" (https://skfb.ly/6Rn7F) by Victoria Reinhold is licensed under Creative Commons Attribution (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).
Font found in dafont.
